original_title: Capo e Croce, le ragioni dei pastori
overview: In June 2010, thousands of shepherds from Sardinia joined their forces: the shepherds invaded ports, airports, roads, and occupied the regional government's palace to achieve dignity and a fair price for their products. This film is an unusual journey through their reasons and their daily life.
title: Capo e Croce, le ragioni dei pastori
